item.title: Prompt Engineering From First Principles: The Mechanics They Don't Teach You - Part 2
item.description: In Part 1, we established a fundamental truth: LLMs are probability engines, not reasoning machines. They don‚Äôt ‚Äúknow‚Äù anything; they predict the next likely token based on patterns seen during training.

item.title: How Machines Learn: Understanding the Core Concepts of Neural Networks
item.description: Imagine trying to teach a child who‚Äôs never seen the world to recognize a face, feel that fire is hot, or sense when it might rain. How would you do it? For centuries, we thought intelligence required something mystical a soul, consciousness, divine spark.
